articles.title: Vivek Ramaswamy's Big Offer For Russia If It Exits China Military Alliance - NDTV
articles.description: To address the growing challenge posed by China, it is important not to let Russia fall into Beijing's lap, Indian-American Republican presidential candidate Vivek Ramaswamy said on Thursday.
articles.content:
Vivek Ramaswamy said Russia has to exit its military alliances with China (File)
